title: Stones River National Battlefield: Photo Gallery
body: Explore This Park    Learn About the Park     Photos & Multimedia     Photo Gallery              Photo Gallery                    150th Anniversary Programs   148 Photos            Battlefield Landscapes   218 Photos  Contains pictures of the cultural landscapes at Stones River National Battlefield.          Historic Battlefield Maps   8 Photos  Period maps depicting terrain and troop positions            Historic Images   60 Photos            Interpretive Programs   15 Photos  Images of living history demonstrations and ranger programs.          Monuments and Markers   9 Photos  Check here for pictures of the monuments and markers at Stones River National Battlefield.            Nature on the Battlefield   40 Photos  Images of plants and animals at Stones River National Battlefield          Remembering the Murfreesboro Raid 2012   92 Photos  Programs at Stones River National Battlefield and Oaklands Historic House Museum commemorating the 150th anniversary of Forrest's Murfreesboro Raid.          Troop Movement Maps   18 Photos
